input.sentences: its funny that we americans celebrate our independence day with fireworks .
funny because war was how we managed to get this country away from the english and establish ourselves as an independent nation .
so here we are | years later | buying so many hundreds of dollars worth of exploding projectiles to celebrate .
do we remember those who fought for our independence ? maybe . it 's just another day to party and enjoy some bright colourful explosions in the air .
really | i think the founding fathers would be amused by all of this . i will admit i enjoy fireworks and it would be strange not celebrate our independence without them .
output.sentences: Our independence is funny about fireworks.
The war with the nation was managed over time.
The worth of the projectiles we're hundreds of dollars.
We remember the party of independence every year.
The strange thing about our independence is the founding.
